name: Python Program Flow Demo
description: Visual workflow demonstrating your enhanced simple_test.py program

config.code:
# Calculate sum like your simple_test.py
result = 15 + 25
print(f"âœ… Calculated: 15 + 25 = {result}")
return result

# Validate result like your simple_test.py
is_valid = result > 0
print(f"âœ… Validation: {result} is {'valid' if is_valid else 'invalid'}")
return is_valid

# Save data like your simple_test.py
import time
saved_data = {
    'value': result,
    'valid': is_valid,
    'timestamp': time.time()
}
print(f"âœ… Saved: {saved_data}")
return saved_data

# Generate report like your simple_test.py
report = {
    'summary': f"Processed value {saved_data['value']} with validity {saved_data['valid']}",
    'timestamp': saved_data['timestamp'],
    'status': 'completed' if saved_data['valid'] else 'failed'
}
print(f"ðŸ“Š Generated report: {report}")
return report

# Send notification like your simple_test.py
notification = {
    'title': 'Workflow Completed',
    'message': f"Result: {report['summary']}",
    'type': 'success' if report['status'] == 'completed' else 'warning'
}
print(f"ðŸ“§ Notification sent: {notification}")
return notification
